0.1.name: wordpress/avatar
0.1.description:
This is a beta release. If anything breaks, SORRY! Drop me a note to report a bug.

Avatar allows you to create / edit custom avatars for your users right in the Admin Panel. Uses the same directory structure as BuddyPress, so your avatars will be sideways-compatible if you have BuddyPress installed. Most of the code in here is inspired-by or a direct copy of the BuddyPress /change-avatar/ code
